name: scilab-language
description: Scilab language support in Atom with whereami-compatible line numberings, snippets, pre-defined functions and more.

whereamiActive.title: Show "whereami"- compatible line-numbering
whereamiActive.description:
"Where am I?" changes the line-numbering inside of functions.
Line-counting will start with *1* if a ``function``-keyword and a matching ``endfunction``-keyword is found. This line-numbering helps especially to debug **Scilab** error messages.
**Warning: This feature is in development. Deactivate if you experience performance issues.**
